snippet.title: Talon's Blade Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Today on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2131460/Talons_Blade/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SoulwareGames

For 20 years war has waged across the land. For 20 years the soldiers of the Southern Empire and Rasnayan Legon have clashed. In a bid to bring the war to a decisive close the Emperor sent his elite force of agents, known only as the Talons, on a covert operation with the hopes of turning the tides of war.

But all is not what it seems within the empire. Treason has led to the capture and near extinction of the Talons.

Marauding outlaws and pirates threaten the livelihood of villages on the fringes of the empire

Soldiers betray and exploit the very people that were tasked with protecting

Blood spawn of an ancient, vile demon have ascended from depth of the earth driven by the war and chaos that washes the lands above in blood.

The world, seeded with a plague of war and corruption, has begun to tear itself apart

Experience the journey of Marcus Veridius as he is set on a path of vengeance to find and kill the ones responsible for the death of his team.
